name: Minesweeper
tagline: A Minesweeper game made by troy
body:
## Overview
Game Minesweeper, made by Troy.

* max size: 30 x 24
* min size: 9 x 9
* easy : 9 x 9 - 10
* normal : 16 x 16 - 40
* hard : 30 x 16 - 99

**totalBlocks / 8 <= totalMines <= totalBlocks / 4**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
